title: GotoBrinno
body:
"Soldier! The beast slayed so many of our army. 

 [[Give Sword|Give Sword Button]]

title: Give Sword Button
body:
"I attacked it with this very sword but it was futile.

His scales are as hard as diamond.
His eyes are made of fire. 

His breath is putrid and will make you faint on the spot. 

Be brave soldier. A death in battle is a noble death."

 [[Run for your life- End game now!|Quit game coward]] [[That's a noble death!-For Utrecht!|Speak to Oracle]]

title: Quit game coward
body:
"You fool! You have doomed us all!"

[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000024_oracle_start/Utrechtbasilisk_1.png[/img]


Basilisk: Screeeeeechhh 

"Can you hear it?"

"The Basilisk is celebrating its victory."


The Basilisk dances in victory. 

The rift opens and swallows everything in Utrecht and spreads through the world. 
The screen goes white. 


"Congratulations the world has ended because of you!"
 [[ Oh No! I want to return to battle the basilisk|Speak to Oracle]] [[I'm okay with being a coward. End game please.|end game coward]]
